nodes.text: Star Wars Vol. 2: Operation Starlight (previously subtitled Tarkin's Will) is a trade paperback compilation of Marvel Comics' 2020 Star Wars, collecting issues 7–11 from the ongoing series. The collection was published on April 6, 2021.

Commander Ellian Zahra has been tasked by the terrifying Darth Vader with the job of tracking down the remnants of the Rebel Fleet, scattered across the galaxy since the Battle of Hoth. From the bridge of her fl agship [sic], the Tarkin's Will, her goal is to eradicate all resistance. But her secret goal is to destroy Leia Organa!
